about_the_game:
Welcome to the exciting world of biopunk, where the boundaries between organics and technology are blurred, nature and science are intertwined in an amazing chaos. You will be taken on a fascinating journey through the mysterious organic island of Tishu, where every step leads to unexpected discoveries and dangerous encounters.

Stepping off the capsule you enter this island. A scientist - the only guide, the only light in the darkness - informs you of a deadly diagnosis. A genetic disease, unremarkable at first glance, is slowly but inexorably destroying your body. But there is a chance - the ingredients for a cure are scattered among the inhabitants of this doomed world in different parts of the island.
So begins your dangerous mission, your wander through outlandish landscapes and ruined metropolises, where organic growth intertwines with the ruins of human civilization. Mushroom forests pulse with life, abandoned cities mysteriously whisper their stories, and toxic wastelands hide dangers and secrets.



Your character is the key to your success. With each new battle or discovery you will modify him, creating a unique deck of abilities. Each card is an opportunity for strategic play, each decision a step toward victory. You will look for synergies between cards, create powerful combos and improve your skills to defeat the deranged mutants that stand in the way of the truth.



But you are not alone in exploring this world. Other inhabitants of the island are also striving to survive and overcome death. Fight or cooperate with them - the choice is yours.



Enigmatic modifications and trading will give your deck incredible power, but there will be a price to pay for each grant of power. What risks are you willing to take to gain an advantage over your enemies?
A dark future awaits you on the organic peninsula of Tishu. Your goal is not only to save yourself, but also to unravel the mystery of the genetic disease that is sweeping the world. Go ahead, to meet the unknown, on the path to truth and salvation!

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains scenes of violence without excessive realism and cruelty, the characters may use сrude language

Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+

short_description: Echoes of Humanity is a card roguelike in the biopunk style. Сhoose your weapon, which will determine your further gameplay and plot development. Build a powerful deck to fight back against the crazed mutants and unravel the secrets of the tragic disaster.
